mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRICE=#{price},NAME=#{name},STOCK=#{stock},IMG= #{img}, CATEGORY_ID = #{category_id}, SOLDAMOUNT= #{soldamount}, DESCRIPTION = #{description} WHERE PRODUCT_ID=#{product_id}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rm, p.* from ( select DISTINCT p.product_id,p.name,p.price,p.stock,p.img, p.category_id,p.soldamount,p.description,c.category_name FROM product p,category c where p.category_id = c.category_id and p.name LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR c.category_name LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' order by p.name asc ) p) where rm between #{start_index} and #{end_index}
